short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Images Color Viewer shows the monochrome colors behind the images in a search result

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Google Images Color Viewer presents the monochrome colors behind the images in a Google search result. Perform a search, go to the images tab, click the extensions icon in the menu-bar (top right) and enjoy the colors. The page will scroll down and up automatically.
